Name: Quantum Multiverse
About the game: Survive the Particle Accelerator facility, where reality has shifted. You are alone, stranded, melancholic, except for a ghostly Being that has entered your universe. It has one goal only...to hunt down and terminate you. Make your way through the futuristic Science facility solving puzzles whilst trying to evade this predator.
